department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.
full_summary:
===============

### Request for Information: Pay Equity Expert Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Treasury Board Secretariat invites industry feedback on the provision of Pay Equity Expert Services for the core public administration and members of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

#### Tender Information

*   Tender Title: Pay Equity Expert Services
*   Tender Reference Number:  WS4102541423-Doc4141110571
*   Solicitation Number: WS4102541423
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: August 11, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: August 31, 2023 2:00 pm EDT
*   Amendment Date: August 30, 2023

**Contact Information**

*   Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Person: Lagace, Peter (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: peter.lagace@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Telephone: Cannot be determined

**Notice Details**
---------------

The Treasury Board Secretariat is seeking feedback from industry on the provision of Pay Equity Expert Services to assist in:

1.  Identifying approaches for implementing pay equity
2.  Obtaining information on these approaches
3.  Providing feedback on the requirement
4.  Responding to a list of questions

Please note that there is no security requirement in this tender.

#### Input and Submission

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the closing date. Any submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Access to Notice URL**
----------------------

The official notice and all supporting documentation can be found on the [Ariba Discovery website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17144936?extsite=MTcxNDQ5MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Disclaimer

Subject to exception, sources appearing in a request for proposals are mandatory.
